title: Soul Plane 2: The Blackjacking!
description: Terrorists plot to capture a plane and crash into a nuclear power plant. The casualties could be in the hundreds of thousands. But they picked the wrong airline…
quote: I’ll stop those terrorists… or die trying.
altHero: a woman at an NWA airline counter giving a grumpy look
alt1: two men in the airport look surprised
alt2: two sharply dressed men on an airplane
alt3: a man points a gun at the captain
alt4: a flight attendant and air marshall talk
